name.ja: インセクト・トーラス

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster.

effect.en: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can make all face-up monsters on your field gain ATK equal to [the number of Galaxy Type monsters with different Attributes in your Graveyard] x 100 until the end of this turn. Then, you can Set 1 "Micronova" or "Micronova Fusion" from your Graveyard to your Spell & Trap Zone.
